div.a: Inside The Daunting Job Of A Super Bowl Photographer

div.div: There's a big difference between taking a great picture, and taking a great picture of the game. In sports, the outcome is all that matters, and no matter how pretty a shot you took, it doesn't matter if it doesn't affect the game.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WPZdQO&via=Digg&text=Inside The Daunting Job Of A Super Bowl Photographer

div.a: The Story Of The Cardiologist Who Captured The Iconic Image Of The Columbia Disaster

div.div: A lot has changed in the decade since Dr. Scott Lieberman captured an iconic shot of Space Shuttle Columbia breaking apart on Feb. 1, 2003. The 6-megapixel digital camera he used to capture the shot was a curiosity then. To get the photo out to the world, he had to drive the file to the office of his local newspaper.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VzxWRv&via=Digg&text=The Story Of The Cardiologist Who Captured The Iconic Image Of The Columbia Disaster

div.a: HBO Wants Google To Censor... HBO.com

div.div: Every week Google is asked to remove more than four million URLs from its search engine. While these automated requests are usually legitimate, mistakes happen more often than one might expect. In a recent DMCA notice HBO asked Google to censor links to HBO.com, as well as several other legitimate sites and blogs.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11xCvRo&via=Digg&text=HBO Wants Google To Censor... HBO.com

div.a: Time-Lapse Captures Amazing Footage Of Ten Different Tornadoes In One Chase

div.div: Tornadoes can be simultaneously awe-inspiring and terrifying (as an Alabama resident for the past 6 years, I can attest to that), and this time-lapse captures ten of them in action, including a mile-wide EF4.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TvdoLw&via=Digg&text=Time-Lapse Captures Amazing Footage Of Ten Different Tornadoes In One Chase

div.a: Harry Potter Sustained An Astoundingly Dangerous Number Of Concussions

div.div: Heroes are always getting slugged in the head in the middle of tense situations and waking up somewhere perilous — the blackout is a convenient device for wrapping up one scene and starting another without any break in the action. And wizard icon Harry Potter suffers such injuries at a frequency that's unusual even for his brand of dashing, courageous protagonist.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WyQv9V&via=Digg&text=Harry Potter Sustained An Astoundingly Dangerous Number Of Concussions

div.a: Watch This $40 Million Gas Platform Sink To The Bottom Of The Sea

div.div: Installing an off-shore gas platform can be a tricky proposition. Things can go very wrong. That's exactly what happened with this $40 million Iranian platform was being installed in the Persian Gulf.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Wo4PCL&via=Digg&text=Watch This $40 Million Gas Platform Sink To The Bottom Of The Sea

div.a: Kai The Homeless Hitchhiker Saves Helpless Bystanders From Jesus Attack

div.div: If that headline isn't enough to pique your interest, we give up. Also, we apologize to Kai as the correct spelling of his name was left unclear.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WmN0E3&via=Digg&text=Kai The Homeless Hitchhiker Saves Helpless Bystanders From Jesus Attack

div.a: The Quest To Cure The Common Hangover

div.div: An enterprising anesthesiologist, clad in black scrubs and armed with a magic IV, isn’t just making sure that the high-roller money that comes to Vegas stays in Vegas. He’s dedicated his life to the noble pursuit of pleasure without pain.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VDardN&via=Digg&text=The Quest To Cure The Common Hangover

div.div: WILL BE FOLLOWED BY SENSELESS GO DADDY AD

div.a: See Budweiser's Baby Clydesdale Grow Up In Tearjerking Super Bowl Spot 'Brotherhood'

div.div: Budweiser sidesteps funnybone and goes for the heart with its Clydesdale-focused spot.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XoV58y&via=Digg&text=See Budweiser's Baby Clydesdale Grow Up In Tearjerking Super Bowl Spot 'Brotherhood'

div.div: HOW DOES THIS COUNT AS A PATENT?

div.a: Is This A Patent For The Rumored 'Budget' iPhone?

div.div: In the absence of hard evidence, we have soft evidence. Like this patent for a plastic iPhone. Maybe this is that rumored budget iPhone? Maybe?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XBw0Hw&via=Digg&text=Is This A Patent For The Rumored 'Budget' iPhone?

div.div: BECAUSE YOU WANT TO SEE THEM TWICE

div.a: Watch All Of The Super Bowl Ads Right Here

div.div: Whether you're a die-hard fan or aren't even sure which teams will be playing on Sunday (Google tells me it's the Ravens and the 49ers, who I understand both play football), Super Bowl commercials are an integral part of both the game and American culture.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WPUqyQ&via=Digg&text=Watch All Of The Super Bowl Ads Right Here

div.a: Your Gluttonous Super Bowl Feast By The Numbers

div.div: This extraordinary amount of food should make us ill, and yet, we will all eat it anyway. Cheers!

div.a: 'Burkas For Babies': Saudi Cleric's New Fatwa Causes Controversy

div.div: A Saudi cleric has called for all female babies to be fully covered by wearing the face veil, commonly known as the burka, citing reports of little girls being sexually molested.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12iPGWx&via=Digg&text='Burkas For Babies': Saudi Cleric's New Fatwa Causes Controversy

div.a: 10 Absurd Paintings That Sold For Millions

div.div: The following are 10 examples of paintings that would be considered junk if they were sold at an ordinary garage sale, but because of their extravagant history, descriptions and estimated value, were sold for millions to the highest bidder.

div.div: Instead of crunching numbers we're looking at various factors to determine when each of the 32 NFL teams will win the Super Bowl. Yes, everyone. Even the Jaguars.

div.a: Military's Deadliest Sniper Killed On Gun Range

div.div: Chris Kyle, a retired Navy SEAL and the U.S. military's most lethal sniper, was fatally shot Saturday along with another man on the gun range of Rough Creek Lodge, a posh resort just west of Glen Rose, Erath County Sheriff Tommy Bryant said.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XzIako&via=Digg&text=Military's Deadliest Sniper Killed On Gun Range

div.div: DROWNED IN A STREAM OF PRESCRIPTIONS

Every morning on her way to work, Kathy Fee holds her breath as she drives past the squat brick building that houses Dominion Psychiatric Associates. It was inside the building that her husband, Rick, implored Richard’s doctor to stop prescribing him Adderall, warning, “You’re going to kill him.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XQxIDi&via=Digg&text=The Dark Side Of Adderall
